Reviews.Title: “wouldn't go there again...”
Reviews.Author: granniesmith
Reviews.Content: stayed night glad wasnt staff front desk friendly halls smelled cigarettes smoking heard somone complaining mold bagel breakfast bar elevator entrance door lock didnt unsafe bathroom clean bad experience

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay to see the big city”
Reviews.Author: steveh327
Reviews.Content: stayed ramada inn nights row arrived night staff extremely helpful getting arriving especially little hotel notice security bar sliding glass door broken wouldnt floor floor unfamiliar saying safe sliding glass door security locks front desk relocated desk clerk friendly relocating floor cozy fridge microwave bed nice bathroom night sleeps nights remade returned doing touristy day breakfast love french toast love breakfast variety items bagels danishes fruits yogurts overall hotel experience price

Reviews.Title: “What a DUMP”
Reviews.Author: nsanefire
Reviews.Content: wow hands worst hotels ive stayed entire life flight canceled stay middle summer half acs didnt blew warm air smelled ash tray mean clean sticky hotel 20 30 carpet furniture stains 20 lord top shower shower curtains stained mildew cleaned seriously dump floor rub able tell difference basicly hotel fit cheap prostitute dont stay hotel stay ramada inn period
